theBalance:TatteredWallet.NAME: Tattered Wallet
theBalance:TatteredWallet.FLAVOR: A beat-up wallet containing pocket money given by mom and dad.
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of combat, gain #b30 #yPocket #yMoney.

theBalance:BandAid.NAME: Zako Sticker
theBalance:BandAid.FLAVOR: Wearing a band-aid as a badge of strength.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose HP due to your own cards, gain #b6 #yBlock.

theBalance:LuckyCoin.NAME: Old Man's Reward
theBalance:LuckyCoin.FLAVOR: The coin the Old Man stuffed in your hand after patting your head.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain #b10-15 additional Gold after winning a combat.

theBalance:AutoCalculator.NAME: Lazy Calculator
theBalance:AutoCalculator.FLAVOR: Use a calculator if you can't count!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you shuffle your draw pile, gain Block equal to #b50% of your current Pocket Money.

theBalance:HushMoney.NAME: Compensation Fee
theBalance:HushMoney.FLAVOR: Ouch! You dare hit me... This isn't over! How are you going to compensate me!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you take #yUnblocked attack damage from an enemy, gain #yGold equal to #b100% of the damage taken.

theBalance:FinancialPlan.NAME: Financial Plan
theBalance:FinancialPlan.FLAVOR: Saving it makes it real money!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of combat, #b20% of remaining Pocket Money is converted into permanent Gold.

theBalance:BlackCard.NAME: Old Man's Black Card
theBalance:BlackCard.FLAVOR: An unlimited credit card from a rich daddy!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E]. NL Whenever you play a non-Attack card, lose #b5 Gold (If insufficient, lose #b2 HP instead).

theBalance:CalibratedScale.NAME: Calibrated Scale
theBalance:CalibratedScale.FLAVOR: Strength and Dexterity must be balanced!
DESCRIPTIONS: Once per turn, when #yStrength equals #yDexterity (and is not 0), gain [E].

theBalance:SymmetricPaper.NAME: Symmetric Papercut
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, if #yStrength equals #yDexterity, gain #b6 #yBlock.

theBalance:CalibratedWeight.NAME: Calibrated Weight
theBalance:CalibratedWeight.FLAVOR: What is lost will be compensated in another way.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you lose #yStrength, gain #b3 Block; whenever you lose #yDexterity, deal #b5 damage to a random enemy.

theBalance:TauntMask.NAME: Taunt Mask
theBalance:TauntMask.FLAVOR: If you can't beat them, piss them off!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the end of your turn, if the enemy has more #yStrength than you, gain [E] next turn.

theBalance:CheatingProof.NAME: Cheating Permit
theBalance:CheatingProof.FLAVOR: As long as I don't admit it, it's not a foul!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #b1 #yArtifact. NL At the end of your turn, lose #b1 #yArtifact.

theBalance:MobiusLoop.NAME: Mobius Strip
theBalance:MobiusLoop.FLAVOR: The excess parts... will vanish at the end of the loop.
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E]. NL At the end of your turn, #yLower the higher of your #yStrength or #yDexterity to match the lower one.

theBalance:DoubleSidedCoin.NAME: Double-Sided Coin
theBalance:DoubleSidedCoin.FLAVOR: No matter how you toss it, you have to spend money in the end!
DESCRIPTIONS: Gain [E]. NL Upon entering a shop, if you have enough Gold, you are #rForced #rto #rpurchase the cheapest card.

theBalance:HandMirror.NAME: Hand Mirror
theBalance:HandMirror.FLAVOR: Look in the mirror, I can see right through your fierce look!
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of your turn, gain #yTemporary #yDexterity equal to the enemy's highest #yStrength.

theBalance:ObservationNotes.NAME: Old Man Observation Diary
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a #yDebuff to an enemy, increase the damage of your next attack by #b3.

theBalance:DoodlePaper.NAME: Doodle Paper
DESCRIPTIONS: The first time you receive a #yDebuff each turn, apply it to ALL enemies.

theBalance:Semipermeable.NAME: Semipermeable Membrane
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you steal stats, gain #b2 additional Temporary stats of the same type.

theBalance:CheapCopier.NAME: Cheap Copier
theBalance:CheapCopier.FLAVOR: The copy quality is bad, but it still works.
DESCRIPTIONS: Each combat, the first #yMirror card #yExhausted is placed into your discard pile instead.

theBalance:EmpathyDoll.NAME: Empathy Doll
theBalance:EmpathyDoll.FLAVOR: Feel what I feel, paid back twofold.
DESCRIPTIONS: While you have a #yDebuff, apply #b+1 additional stack of #yDebuffs to enemies.

theBalance:AceAgent.NAME: Zako Agent
theBalance:AceAgent.FLAVOR: Let someone else take the hit for you!
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever an enemy gains #yBlock, you gain half that amount of #yBlock.

theBalance:BlackHeart.NAME: Black Heart
theBalance:BlackHeart.FLAVOR: Anger is only fun when shared~
DESCRIPTIONS: At the start of each turn, both you and the enemy gain #b1 #yStrength.

theBalance:BlankCard.NAME: Daddy's "Blank" Card
theBalance:BlankCard.FLAVOR: Just swipe this card, and you can buy anything!
DESCRIPTIONS: You have #bInfinite Energy. NL Cards cost #yGold instead of Energy (#b6 times cost). If Gold is insufficient, lose HP instead. NL You can no longer obtain Gold from combat rewards.

theBalance:SymbioticCrystal.NAME: Symbiotic Red Crystal
theBalance:SymbioticCrystal.FLAVOR: Hold it in your mouth, and you can taste the flavor of other people's lives...
DESCRIPTIONS: You and enemies gain 25% #yVampire (Lifesteal). NL #yBlock gained is reduced by #b50%. Enemy Block gain is increased by #b50%. NL Your Max HP can no longer be increased. NL (Values rounded down)
